hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RESET_CODE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: remove existing dataset and extract from the dataset archive

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: QUICK_BUILD_FLOW
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
this field need a complete config line, to run a flow
/java/exo-working/VALIDATIONS/TQA-432/PLF-354_VISUALVM_PROFILING_PATCH_20120606 /mnt/nfs4/DATASETS/PLF/PLF3.5.x/3.5.x_02/NODATASET.zip plf_jcr plf_idm!PERF_PLF_INTRANET_99_SIMPLE_CALENDAR_HOMEPAGE 2 10 7200 9999 192.168.5.8 8080 CALENDAR_HOME_PATCH20120606_01 true true - - TQA-432_CALENDAR_HOME_PATCH20120606!eXoPLF.install.sh

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash BUILD_STEP=$(( BUILD_NUMBER - LAST_BUILD_NUMBER ))
pushd $HOME/testsuite if [ ! "${QUICK_BUILD_FLOW}" == "NO_QUICK_BUILD_FLOW" ]; then echo "${QUICK_BUILD_FLOW}">>${TESTSCRIPT}_CURRENT_CONFIG echo " ... the system will run a quick build flow with QUICK_BUILD_FLOW=${QUICK_BUILD_FLOW} ... " fi echo " ... +++ CURRENT CONFIG FILE:: +++ ...." cat ${TESTSCRIPT}_CURRENT_CONFIG echo " ... --- CURRENT CONFIG FILE:: --- ...." pushd $HOME/testsuite && bash jmeter-utils-testcontroller.sh ${STAGE} ${TESTSCRIPT} ${RESET_CODE} grep "success" ${TESTSCRIPT}_testresult.log; last_code=$?; if [ ! ${last_code} -eq "0" ]; then a=$((1/0)) fi
